Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would greatly benefit you. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in its utility and relevance to your needs. I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500, which I believe strikes a fair balance between my valuation and your perceived worth of the product. Please consider this offer carefully, and let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations. Looking forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
